cause.description:
I will be playing in a 24hr ball tourny to raise money for Brest Cancer research. If you would like to find out more you can click on the link below, and if you would like to make a donation click on Donate to and individual on the left hand side of the web site and enter in my name (Tanya Bunbury) then it will ask for you person info and the amount you wish to donate. Every little bit counts. Thanks ! https://secure.e2rm.com/registrant/LoginRegister.aspx?EventID=11319&LangPref=en-CA
1. Breast Cancer affects everyone is some way or another
cause.mission: Raise money for Breast Cancer Research
cause.name: Battin Against Breast Cancer
